import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Row, Col, Form as FormBS } from "react-bootstrap"; import Button from "../button/Button"; import "./form.scss"; import closeicon from "../../assets/Dell_light.png"; const Form = ({ show, setShow }) => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: "", dateOfBirth: "", eyeColour: "", hairColour: "", gender: "female", hogwartsStudent: true, }); const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return ( Agrega un personaje Nombre handleChange(e)} /> Introduce un nombre Cumpleaños handleChange(e)} /> Color de Ojos handleChange(e)} /> Color de Pelo handleChange(e)} /> Género
handleChange(e)} /> handleChange(e)} /> Posición
handleChange(e)} /> handleChange(e)} /> ); }; export default Form;
